node.title: Large fire near Wānaka continues to burn, locals told to avoid
node.description: The mercury's expected to soar to 28 degrees in Wānaka today, as firefighters battle an uncontained scrub fire.
node.content:
["The mercury's expected to soar to 28 degrees in Wānaka today, as firefighters battle an uncontained scrub fire.", "", "
The blaze has ripped through 200 hectares of regenerating bush at Emerald Bay. Photo: Supplied / Emily Richer
", "Queenstown Lakes deputy mayor Calum MacLeod told Morning Report the fire was still burning but there were no evacuations overnight.", "The blaze ripped through about 200 hectares of regenerating bush at Emerald Bay yesterday afternoon, closing Mount Aspiring Road.", "Eight ground crew and eight helicopters with monsoon buckets have resumed fighting the blaze today.", ""The area itself is very steep and that's obviously an issue for the eight ground crews who are working on the ground. Hopefully they'll come through it safe."", "", "
The blaze could be seen from a neighbouring campsite. Photo: Supplied / Emily Richer
", "A local using a drone over the fire has been an annoyance, MacLeod said.", ""There was a bit of concern when that was identified yesterday."", "With smoke able to be seen from the township, MacLeod encouraged people not to go seeking a view of the fire.", ""It is obviously a very large fire ... so it's generally a lot of smoke."", "He said temperatures in the area were not predicted to get as high as yesterday and hoped wind would not pick up in the afternoon.", "MetService meterologist Daniel Corrigan said fine weather with a light west-to-northwesterly-wind is forecast for the region today.", "He said a high of 28 degrees is forecast for today and tomorrow, but the temperature's set to drop mid-week.", "", "
Smoke from the fire was able to be seen from the township. Photo: Supplied / Emily Richer
", "", "
Helicopters with monsoon buckets continue to battle the fire. Photo: Supplied / Emily Richer
", "", "
Smoke from the fire was seen from a nearby campsite. Photo: Supplied / Emily Richer
", "", "
The fire as seen from the campground on Sunday night. Photo: Supplied / Bryce Cameron
"]
